ThingDef.label: power conduit
ThingDef.description: A set of electrical cables for moving power around. Can be placed under walls and other buildings.

ThingDef.label: heavy power conduit
ThingDef.description: A set of heavy electrical cables, very strong and non-flammable

ThingDef.label: power switch
ThingDef.description: Switches power on/off.

ThingDef.label: Battery
ThingDef.description: Stores electricity when there is excess power and yields it when there is not. Warning - charged batteries tend to explode when heated or wet.

ThingDef.label: Fission battery
ThingDef.description: Stores electricity and recycles charge using fission processes. Slightly more efficient and stores four times as much. Warning - charged batteries tend to explode when heated or wet.

ThingDef.label: solar generator
ThingDef.description: Produces electricity from sunlight. Does not work in the dark.

ThingDef.label: wind turbine
ThingDef.description: A wind-powered electrical generator. Requires a large clear space in front and behind for optimal air flow.

ThingDef.label: steam generator
ThingDef.description: A steam turbine generator that produces electricity. Requires a hopper filled with wood logs, or ethanol for fuel. Energy Output: 750W

ThingDef.label: generator hopper
ThingDef.description: Holds resources for the Steam Generator.

ThingDef.label: Biogenerator
ThingDef.description: A biogenerator that produces electricity. Requires a hopper filled with BioDiesel or BioCells for fuel. Energy Output: 950W

ThingDef.label: biogenerator hopper
ThingDef.description: Holds resources for the steam generator.

ThingDef.label: bio refinery
ThingDef.Description: A machine for making Bio fuels.

ThingDef.label: Coal power plant
ThingDef.description: A fuel power plant that produces electricity. Requires a hopper filled with coal or peat.

ThingDef.label: Coal feeder
ThingDef.description: Produces electricity from burning coal. Coal and peat is fed into it via a fuel feeder placed on the side.

ThingDef.label: Fuel power plant
ThingDef.description: A fuel power plant that produces electricity. Requires a hopper filled with fuel.

ThingDef.label: Fuel feeder
ThingDef.description: Produces electricity from burning fuel. Fuel is fed into it via a fuel feeder placed on the side.

ThingDef.label: geothermal generator
ThingDef.description: Produces electricity from geothermal steam geysers. Must be placed on a geyser.

ThingDef.label: Nuclear power plant
ThingDef.description: A small nuclear power plant, 18kW power output. WARNING: In case of a nuclear meltdown, build walls around the debris to contain the radiation.

ThingDef.label: nuclear power plant debris
ThingDef.description: Radioactive debris of nuclear power plant. build walls around to contain the radiation.

ThingDef.label: Military nuclear plant
ThingDef.description: A small nuclear power plant, 18kW power output. WARNING: In case of a nuclear meltdown, build walls around the debris to contain the radiation.

ThingDef.label: Military nuclear plant debris
ThingDef.description: Radioactive debris of nuclear power plant. build walls around to contain the radiation.

ThingDef.label: Nuclear feeder
ThingDef.description: Holds resources for the Nuclear reactor. Uses highly enriched uranium.

ThingDef.label: capsule reactor
ThingDef.description: A high-tech portable fusion reactor. Provides a constant power supply regardless of environmental factors.

ThingDef.label: Gause Wind Turbine
ThingDef.description: A wind-powered gause electrical generator, No aroun area ;).

ThingDef.label: Tesla Ligthning Power
ThingDef.Description: Be carefull awesome power of lightning, need some cooling after time

ThingDef.label: Plasma reactor
ThingDef.Description: Produces tax free electricity from steam geyser - plasma powered

ThingDef.label: Plasma reactor feeder
ThingDef.description: Holds resources for the Steam Generator.

ThingDef.label: Plasma generator
ThingDef.Description: Produces tax free electricity from plasma discharges, needs to be fully charged first

ThingDef.label: Xenon-Ion Turbine
ThingDef.description: Produces electricity by collecting trace Xenon from water and Ionizing it into plasma. Must be placed on a geyser.

ThingDef.label: Antimatter Reactor
ThingDef.description: The antimatter contained separate from the normal matter by magnetic fields so that no unintended reactions take place. The energy would then be extracted in much the same way that nuclear reactors capture the expended heat and light energy from fission reactions.

ThingDef.label: Antimatter reactor feeder
ThingDef.description: Holds resources of matter for the Antimatter reactor.
